00029 /* creates the application's customer gui form and data model. */
00030 CustomerForm::CustomerForm(const int id, QWidget *parent) : QDialog(parent) {
00031     /* create the appropriate customer line edits, labels and set buddies. */
00032     nameEdit = new QLineEdit;
00033     nameLabel = new QLabel(nameLabelStr);
00034     nameLabel->setBuddy(nameEdit);
00035 
00036     addressEdit = new QLineEdit;
00037     addressLabel = new QLabel(addressLabelStr);
00038     addressLabel->setBuddy(addressEdit);
00039 
00040     cityEdit = new QLineEdit;
00041     cityLabel = new QLabel(cityLabelStr);
00042     cityLabel->setBuddy(cityEdit);
00043 
00044     stateEdit = new QLineEdit;
00045     stateLabel = new QLabel(stateLabelStr);
00046     stateLabel->setBuddy(stateEdit);
00047 
00048     phoneEdit = new QLineEdit;
00049     phoneLabel = new QLabel(phoneLabelStr);
00050     phoneLabel->setBuddy(phoneEdit);
00051 
00052     emailEdit = new QLineEdit;
00053     emailLabel = new QLabel(emailLabelStr);
00054     emailLabel->setBuddy(emailEdit);
00055 
00056     cardDateEdit = new EmptyDateEdit(QDate()); /* Null Date. */
00057     cardDateLabel = new QLabel(cardDateLabelStr);
00058     cardDateLabel->setBuddy(cardDateEdit);
00059 
00060     cardMoneyEdit = new QLineEdit;
00061     cardMoneyLabel = new QLabel(cardMoneyLabelStr);
00062     cardMoneyLabel->setBuddy(cardMoneyEdit);
00063 
00064     cardComboBox = new QComboBox;
00065     cardTypeLabel = new QLabel(cardTypeLabelStr);
00066     cardTypeLabel->setBuddy(cardComboBox);
00067 
00068     /* create the management buttons. */
00069     cardButton = new QPushButton(cardButtonStr);
00070     addButton = new QPushButton(addButtonStr);
00071     deleteButton = new QPushButton(deleteButtonStr);
00072     closeButton = new QPushButton(closeButtonStr);
00073 
00074     /* add the buttons in a button box dialog. */
00075     buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00076     buttonBox->addButton(addButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00077     buttonBox->addButton(deleteButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00078     buttonBox->addButton(closeButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00079 
00080     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00081     connect(cardButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addEditCard()));
00082     connect(addButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addCustomer()));
00083     connect(deleteButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(deleteCustomer()));
00084     connect(closeButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00085     connect(cardComboBox, SIGNAL(activated(const int)), this, SLOT(handleCardType(const int)));
00086 
00087     /* create the relational table model for the customer. */
00088     tableModel = new QSqlRelationalTableModel(this);
00089 
00090     /* set the table to select. */
00091     tableModel->setTable("customer");
00092 
00093     /* get either a selected customer or none. */
00094     tableModel->setFilter(QString("customer.id = %1").arg(id));
00095 
00096     /* set a relation for the card type of the customer. */
00097     tableModel->setRelation(Customer_CardId, QSqlRelation("cardtype", "id", "title"));
00098 
00099     /* select the customer model in order to show the data. */
00100     tableModel->select();
00101 
00102     /* create the table model of the cards type for the customer. */
00103     QSqlTableModel *relationModel = tableModel->relationModel(Customer_CardId);
00104 
00105     /* set the card type table model to the card type combobox. */
00106     cardComboBox->setModel(relationModel);
00107 
00108     /* select the field to show in the combobox. */
00109     cardComboBox->setModelColumn(relationModel->fieldIndex("title"));
00110 
00111     /* create a data widget mapper for the customer fields. */
00112     mapper = new QDataWidgetMapper(this);
00113 
00114     /* set some operative options in the mapper. */
00115     mapper->setSubmitPolicy(QDataWidgetMapper::AutoSubmit);
00116     mapper->setModel(tableModel);
00117     mapper->setItemDelegate(new QSqlRelationalDelegate(this));
00118 
00119     /* add to the map the customer GUI objects which manage the fields. */
00120     mapper->addMapping(nameEdit, Customer_Name);
00121     mapper->addMapping(addressEdit, Customer_Address);
00122     mapper->addMapping(cityEdit, Customer_City);
00123     mapper->addMapping(stateEdit, Customer_State);
00124     mapper->addMapping(phoneEdit, Customer_Phone);
00125     mapper->addMapping(emailEdit, Customer_Email);
00126     mapper->addMapping(cardDateEdit, Customer_CardDate);
00127     mapper->addMapping(cardMoneyEdit, Customer_CardMoney);
00128     mapper->addMapping(cardComboBox, Customer_CardId);
00129 
00130     /* lock all card related gui objects. */
00131     cardMoneyEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00132     cardDateEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00133     cardComboBox->setDisabled(true);
00134 
00135     /* if there is no customer selected. */
00136     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) {
00137         /* lock the rest gui objects (readonly, disabled). */
00138         lockGUI();
00139 
00140         /* none option index from the cardtype combobox. */
00141         previousCardType = -1;
00142 
00143         /* focus the close button. */
00144         closeButton->setFocus();
00145     }
00146     else {
00147         /* try to select the first one in the model. */
00148         mapper->toFirst();
00149 
00150         /* selected option index in the card combobox. */
00151         previousCardType = cardComboBox->currentIndex();
00152     }
00153 
00154     /* create a table grid. */
00155     QGridLayout *mainLayout = new QGridLayout;
00156 
00157     /* add the following objects in the appropriate position in the grid. */
00158     mainLayout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00159     mainLayout->addWidget(nameEdit, 0, 1, 1, 2);
00160     mainLayout->addWidget(cardTypeLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00161     mainLayout->addWidget(cardComboBox, 1, 1);
00162     mainLayout->addWidget(cardButton, 1, 2);
00163     mainLayout->addWidget(cardDateLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00164     mainLayout->addWidget(cardDateEdit, 2, 1, 1, 2);
00165     mainLayout->addWidget(cardMoneyLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00166     mainLayout->addWidget(cardMoneyEdit, 3, 1, 1, 2);
00167     mainLayout->addWidget(addressLabel, 4, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00168     mainLayout->addWidget(addressEdit, 4, 1, 1, 2);
00169     mainLayout->addWidget(cityLabel, 5, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00170     mainLayout->addWidget(cityEdit, 5, 1, 1, 2);
00171     mainLayout->addWidget(stateLabel, 6, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00172     mainLayout->addWidget(stateEdit, 6, 1, 1, 2);
00173     mainLayout->addWidget(phoneLabel, 7, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00174     mainLayout->addWidget(phoneEdit, 7, 1, 1, 2);
00175     mainLayout->addWidget(emailLabel, 8, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00176     mainLayout->addWidget(emailEdit, 8, 1, 1, 2);
00177     mainLayout->addWidget(buttonBox, 9, 0, 1, 3);
00178 
00179     /* set some GUI options for the table grid. */
00180     mainLayout->setRowMinimumHeight(9, 35);
00181     mainLayout->setRowStretch(9, 1);
00182     mainLayout->setColumnStretch(2, 1);
00183 
00184     /* do not allow to resize the form. */
00185     mainLayout->setSizeConstraint (QLayout::SetFixedSize);
00186 
00187     /* set the layout for the customer form. */
00188     setLayout(mainLayout);
00189 
00190     /* set the text of the form's window. */
00191     setWindowTitle(custWinTitleStr);
00192 }
00193 
00194 /* update any changes and close the form. */
00195 void
00196 CustomerForm::done(const int result) {
00197     /* check characters for sql injection issue. */
00198     if(nameEdit->text().contains(QRegExp(sqlInjectionRegExpStr))) {
00199         /* show a message. */
00200         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, sqlInjectCustStr);
00201 
00202         /* do nothing. */
00203         return;
00204     }
00205 
00206     /* update any changes. */
00207     mapper->submit();
00208 
00209     /* return from the form. */
00210     QDialog::done(result);
00211 }
00212 
00213 /* ask the user if he/she wants to add / edit a card type. */
00214 void
00215 CustomerForm::addEditCard() {
00216     /* check if the are any rows in the model. */
00217     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) return;
00218 
00219     /* disable the card type combobox. */
00220     cardComboBox->setDisabled(true);
00221 
00222     /* ask him/her if he/she wants to add / edit a card type. */
00223     int r = QMessageBox::question(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cardCreationStr, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No);
00224 
00225     /* if he/she don't want it just return and do nothing. */
00226     if (r == QMessageBox::No) return;
00227 
00228     /* enable the card type combobox and open the list. */
00229     cardComboBox->setDisabled(false);
00230     cardComboBox->showPopup();
00231 }
00232 
00233 /* adds a new customer in the database. */
00234 void
00235 CustomerForm::addCustomer() {
00236     /* check characters for sql injection issue. */
00237     if(nameEdit->text().contains(QRegExp(sqlInjectionRegExpStr))) {
00238         /* show a message. */
00239         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, sqlInjectCustStr);
00240 
00241         /* do nothing. */
00242         return;
00243     }
00244 
00245     /* disable the add and delete button. */
00246     deleteButton->setDisabled(true);
00247     addButton->setDisabled(true);
00248 
00249     /* unlock the gui objects. */
00250     unlockGUI();
00251 
00252     /* get the selected customer. */
00253     int row = mapper->currentIndex();
00254 
00255     /* check if the are any rows in the model. */
00256     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) row = 0;
00257 
00258     /* perform any changes to the current customer. */
00259     mapper->submit();
00260 
00261     /* disable the card type combobox. */
00262     cardComboBox->setDisabled(true);
00263 
00264     /* clear the card date. */
00265     cardDateEdit->clear();
00266 
00267     /* create a new customer record. */
00268     tableModel->insertRow(row);
00269 
00270     /* select the new customer record. */
00271     mapper->setCurrentIndex(row);
00272 }
00273 
00274 /* deletes the current selected customer from the database. */
00275 void
00276 CustomerForm::deleteCustomer() {
00277     /* check if the are any rows in the model. */
00278     if (!tableModel->rowCount()) return;
00279 
00280     /* ask him/her if he/she wants to delete the customer. */
00281     int r = QMessageBox::question(this, infoMsgTitleStr, deleteCustomerStr, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No);
00282 
00283     /* if he/she don't want it just return and do nothing. */
00284     if (r == QMessageBox::No) return;
00285 
00286     /* get the row of the current customer selected. */
00287     const int row = mapper->currentIndex();
00288 
00289     /* get the record of the specific customer. */
00290     QSqlRecord record = tableModel->record(row);
00291 
00292     /* get the id of the customer. */
00293     const int id = record.value(Customer_Id).toInt();
00294 
00295     /* declare a sql query object. */
00296     QSqlQuery query;
00297 
00298     /* execute queries to reparent the vehicles (if any) to simple guest. */
00299     query.exec(QString("UPDATE vehicle SET cust_id = 1 WHERE cust_id = %1").arg(id));
00300     query.exec(QString("UPDATE transacts SET cust_id = 1 WHERE cust_id = %1").arg(id));
00301 
00302     /* now remove also the customer. */
00303     tableModel->removeRow(row);
00304 
00305     /* apply any changes. */
00306     mapper->submit();
00307 
00308     /* disable the card type combobox. */
00309     cardComboBox->setDisabled(true);
00310 
00311     clearGUI(); /* clear the data from the gui objects .*/
00312     lockGUI();  /* lock all gui objects (readonly, disabled). */
00313 
00314     /* select the appropriate customer. */
00315     mapper->setCurrentIndex(qMin(row, tableModel->rowCount() - 1));
00316 }
00317 
00318 /* handle the card type selection. */
00319 void
00320 CustomerForm::handleCardType (const int index) {
00321     /* set editable the date card and card money. */
00322     cardMoneyEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00323     cardDateEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00324 
00325     /* switch according to the card type. */
00326     switch(index) {
00327         case ErrorCardType: /* no selection, empty list. */
00328         case NoCardType:
00329         case SimpleCardType:
00330             {
00331                 /* clear both date and money of the card. */
00332                 cardDateEdit->clear();
00333                 cardMoneyEdit->clear();
00334                 break;
00335             }
00336         case MonthCardType:
00337         case YearCardType:
00338             {
00339                 /* create the payment wizard. */
00340                 PayWizard payform (nameEdit->text(),
00341                                    index == MonthCardType ? MONTH_CARD_FEE : YEAR_CARD_FEE,
00342                                    this);
00343 
00344                 /* execute the wizard form and return payment completion status. */
00345                 if(payform.exec() == QDialog::Accepted) {
00346                     /* set the date of the card as current. */
00347                     cardDateEdit->setDate(QDate::currentDate());
00348 
00349                     /* clear the card money. */
00350                     cardMoneyEdit->clear();
00351                 }
00352                 else {
00353                     /* set the previous card type index from the combobox. */
00354                     cardComboBox->setCurrentIndex(previousCardType);
00355                 }
00356                 break;
00357             }
00358         case CreditCardType:
00359             {
00360                 /* assume no money first. */
00361                 double money = 0;
00362 
00363                 /* assume that user didn't press ok from the dialog. */
00364                 bool ok = false;
00365 
00366                 /* get money the client wants. */
00367                 money = QInputDialog::getDouble(this,
00368                                                 infoMsgTitleStr,
00369                                                 cardInputMoneyStr,
00370                                                 0, 1, 1000, 2, &ok);
00371 
00372                 /* if ok button is pressed from the dialog. */
00373                 if(ok) {
00374                     /* create the payment wizard. */
00375                     PayWizard payform (nameEdit->text(), money, this);
00376 
00377                     /* execute the wizard form and return payment completion status. */
00378                     if(payform.exec() == QDialog::Accepted) {
00379                         /* clear the date of the card. */
00380                         cardDateEdit->clear();
00381 
00382                         /* set the new money to the edit (if changes happen). */
00383                         cardMoneyEdit->setText(QString("%1").arg(money));
00384                     }
00385                     else {
00386                         /* set the previous card type index from the combobox. */
00387                         cardComboBox->setCurrentIndex(previousCardType);
00388                     }
00389                 }
00390                 else {
00391                     /* set the previous card type index from the combobox. */
00392                     cardComboBox->setCurrentIndex(previousCardType);
00393                 }
00394                 break;
00395             }
00396         default: /* this should never happen. */
00397             break;
00398     }
00399 
00400     /* set readonly the date card and card money. */
00401     cardMoneyEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00402     cardDateEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00403 
00404     /* disable the card type combobox. */
00405     cardComboBox->setDisabled(true);
00406 }
00407 
00408 /* lock (readonly, disable) the gui objects. */
00409 void
00410 CustomerForm::lockGUI() {
00411     nameEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00412     addressEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00413     cityEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00414     stateEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00415     phoneEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00416     emailEdit->setReadOnly(true);
00417 }
00418 
00419 /* unlock (editable, enable) the gui objects. */
00420 void
00421 CustomerForm::unlockGUI() {
00422     nameEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00423     addressEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00424     cityEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00425     stateEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00426     phoneEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00427     emailEdit->setReadOnly(false);
00428 }
00429 
00430 /* clear the contents of the gui objects. */
00431 void
00432 CustomerForm::clearGUI() {
00433     nameEdit->clear();
00434     addressEdit->clear();
00435     cityEdit->clear();
00436     stateEdit->clear();
00437     phoneEdit->clear();
00438     emailEdit->clear();
00439     cardMoneyEdit->clear();
00440     cardDateEdit->clear();
00441 }
